definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_xplevel"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_xp_until_next_level"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">7</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">STARVE</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="entity_remove_xp"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block><block type="entity_xplevel" x="131" y="330"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></xml>
